name: Dude VS Undeads
description:
Make the undeads dead again.

In this game inspired by Desktop Dungeon and Hoplite, make your way through an undead-infested dungeon.

The levels are procedurally generated, but the game is turn-based and mechanisms are deterministic, so consider each level as a puzzle to solve. Use the tools at your disposal efficiently and creatively (each spell has many different usages, experiment to discover them).

Done on my free time during the lockdowns.
Feedback appreciated :)
